forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers likely. Low 52F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the evening...overcast overnight with occasional rain likely. Low 11C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low 52F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
